title: cryptogeniusdice
author: cryptogeniusdice
content: so after doubting the genuinity of stake.com , i started keeping track of the bets which i placed. I started recording my gameplay session also keeping note of the bet on a spreadsheet for mines. in that i came to know few if the bet where i got losses were missing . so inquired to support team , they stated that missing bets were archived as stake.com cannot store data of so many billion bets. i questioned them , ok but how come previous bets than archived are not archived nor the bets after. why only specific bets are archived .they provided me the details with back end , with wrong entry , while i had the recorded bet with me. Full Details on the Video Video 1 :https://youtu.be/mBF4aWTmi4kand after that i met the dumbest engineer for stake.com alias meebitVideo 2 : https://youtu.be/I2CRY7MwlwUI asked them to compensate for the scam they are running as their exposed in reality. Any questions you would like, i would happy to answer stake.com asslickers.

comments.author: Eternad
comments.body: I’m not Stake player nor asslicker   but it’s very hard to get your point here since you are claiming that result varies on the bets that you recorded and their backup while there’s no way for us to verify easily the difference. Also please lock your first thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5459921.msg62554169#msg62554169 before starting new one because you are already spamming the forum if you open multiple thread with same content. You are using the forum to pressure Stake to pay you for your discovery while they can easily admit that its just a bug a kick you out of the system.

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: I also watched the video, it was very fast and does not clearly state the ground where the stake cheated on the mine session he is talking about, he shows some codes and bet numbers then some images of mine game but I still can't figure out the cheat in there.  @OP could have highlighted the most important details and put more time on emphasizing it making the viewer understand where stake.com cheat in one view.No one will dissect the video to dig deeper into the information since there are no links whatsoever to the data shown on the video.  Other streamers give a link to screenshots or record of the important data but @OP just don't have anything on the description of the video.
